quote: “Do your own thing on your own terms and get what you came here for”
author: Oliver James

quote: “The language of Friendship is not words, but meanings.”
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: “In case you never get a second chance: don't be afraid!" "And what if you do get a second chance?" "You take it!”
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: “Always forgive, but never forget, else you will be a prisoner of your own hatred, and doomed to repeat your mistakes forever.”
author: Wil Zeus

quote: “I cannot compromise my respect for your love. You can keep your love, I will keep my respect.”
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: “Most people overestimate what they can do in one year and underestimate what they can do in ten years.”
author: Bill Gates

quote: “Ah, but a man's reach should exceed his grasp,Or what's a heaven for?”
author: Robert Browning

quote: “The absence of the will to live is, alas, not sufficient to make one want to die.”
author: Michel Houellebecq

quote: “Dream, Dream DreamDreams transform into thoughts And thoughts result in action.”
author: APJ ABDUL KALAM

quote: “If the only prayer you say throughout your life is "Thank You," then that will be enough.”
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: “What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.”
author: Otto Rank

quote: “No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.”
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: “God is subtle but he is not malicious.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “Grace is the face that love wears when it meets imperfection.”
author: Joseph R. Cooke

quote: “Love those you hate you.”
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: “Make voyages. Attempt them. There's nothing else.”
author: Tennesse Williams

quote: “Collective madness is called sanity ..”
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: “Free yourself from the complexities and drama of your life. Simplify. Look within. Within ourselves we all have the gifts and talents we need to fulfill the purpose we've been blessed with.”
author: Steve Maraboli

quote: “If it sounds like writing, I rewrite it.”
author: Elmore Leonard

quote: “The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.”
author: Criss Jami

quote: “Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.”
author: Roy T. Bennett
